@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Query the location of an arbitrary DOM element in relation to its top
level body element. Works in all major browsers:

* Mozilla 1.5 + 2.0
* Internet Explorer 6.0 + 7.0 (both standard & quirks mode)
* Opera 9.2
* Safari 3.0 beta
